mapper.select: SELECT id, `group`, code, from_time, to_time, `from`, `to`, `starting`, destination FROM group_flight WHERE `group` = #{group} AND group_flight.code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{code}, '%') ORDER BY update_date
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO group_flight ( id, `group`, code, from_time, to_time, `from`, `to`, `starting`, destination, create_date, update_by, create_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{group}, #{code}, #{fromTime}, #{toTime}, #{from}, #{to}, #{starting}, #{destination}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE group_flight SET code = #{code}, from_time = #{fromTime}, to_time = #{toTime}, `from` = #{from}, `to` = #{to}, `starting` = #{starting}, destination = #{destination}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
